item.title: Poster: Sensitivity of Smith Glacier to Melt Variability, Marginal Weakening, and Terminal Buttressing
2019 South Pole field season
item.description: In December, I headed to the South Pole for a third field season, wrapping our survey of regional ice flow. Like last year, this was a very quick season with only about two weeks at the Pole. As in previous years, the field season was timed to span the solstice so as to get the warmest weather at the South Pole (~-10 F this year). We left for New Zealand week after Thanksgiving, and after getting our cold weather gear we started trying to fly to Antarctica on December 13th.

item.title: Modeled temperature and basal shear stress of NEGIS and implications for surge mechanics of Storstr√∏mmen
